AkuMeeting: After an especially long week, you decide to treat yourself to some games at the mall arcade, "Frame-Perfect".
There is a long line in front of the "Salaryman Fighter 4: Brutal Accounting" cabinet...
The people in line are whispering amongst themselves.
"...She's gone eighteen matches without losing a match..."
"...that girl up there just got a PERFECT! Wow!..."
"...I heard she went to the championships for 'Salaryman Fighter 3: Payroll of Blood' two years ago... she's still got it..."
You get in line to play and after a few matches, its finally your turn.
"Alrighty, come on up, don't be shy! It's time for your butt-kicking!"
Alright there, buddy. Quit starin' and pick your character.
You go to the 'Select Character' screen.
You can pick from a Shoto-character, a Zoner or a Grappler.
Exactly the kind of character I excel against, haha!
You must have been watching my other matches and saw me playing the grappler...
This might be tough... but I didn't become an expert grappler player by shying away from the full-screen game!
This fight is gonna be up close and personal!
I hope you know a thing or two about footsies.
Aku chooses a character just named 'Muscles', a tall muscular girl in a red motorcycle jacket who excels in grabs and kicks.
Alright, buddy! Let's dance! There's a line forming behind you!
You can barely keep up with Aku's technique.
For every hit you land on her, she lands 3 on you.
Your character stands up after being swept and she moves in on you to finish you off...
Aku anticipates your wake-up attack and hits you with a meaty jab. She easily takes the round.
Aku takes no action for just a moment while you hold back to block and then hits you with a grab, finishing you off and winning the match
Blocking on wake up? Your more disciplined than I gave you credit for! Don't forget though... I'm a grappling professional! You're gonna have to come outta that shell to beat me!
Aku goes for a throw on you and you input a throw of your own! You tech the throw and take no damage!
Sadly, it only postpones the inevitable. Aku still ends up winning the round.
WHOA! You had me sweating for a second there! You're more dangerous than I gave you credit for! I'm excited for the next round!
Aku is playing more conservatively this time.
Her defense is almost impossible to penetrate, but eventually you get her into a corner.
Good call... I was ready for you to come closer...
But one good decision isn't enough!
You draw out the fight with your patience... but its not enough to withstand Aku's onslaught.
You input a quarter circle forward and do your special move.
Aku does an invincible reversal, going through your special move and sending you into a knock down state.
She uses this new momentum to win the second match.
Aku's face lights up as she inputs the motions for her command grab!
The screen goes into an extended cutscene showing her character perfectly catch you out of the air and do a fancy wrestling move to you.
It spends all of her meter... but she is able to completely KO you with this one move!
Aku beats you twice in a game of 2 out of 3.
I wouldn't go so far as to say "you're pretty good" or anything, but at very least I think you've got some potential.
If you want to get a few lessons, just hit me up any time.
I've got a line of people to defeat!
Aku graciously takes you on as a student.
You decide to give her a call sometime...
AkuphoneCallpickUp1: r u trying to do anything later???
I'm literally sitting here doing... nothin lmfao
AkuphoneCallpickUp2: what can i do ya fer?
Where could you POSSIBLY wanna go with lil' ol me?
AkuphoneCallpickUpBurgers: YEAAA! You know I love some burgers.
Lemme put some air in my bike tires and I'll be there before you know it!
AkuphoneCallpickUpBar: Mmm... ok! I guess I can take it easy for a few hours...
I hear there is a music venue upstairs there... maybe we'll be able to hear some music if we sit by the stairwell!
AkuphoneCallpickUpPark: The park?? That's so cute, haha.
Alright, alright... I'll meetcha over there! I hope you don't mind if I bike around while we're there.
AkuphoneCallpickUpVenue: Ooo... a lil music show, eh?
Yea i could be down for a lil dancin
AkuphoneCallpickUpWrestling: Yeah, I'm down for a little mano a mano battle.
AkuphoneCallpickUpRestaurant: Whoa! Fancy fancy! Alright alright, I'm sure I have SOMETHING that's socially appropriate to wear...
AkuphoneCallpickUpHome: A night at home? Just big chillin?
AkuphoneCallpickUpMall: You want a rematch at the arcade, huh?
You know I'm ready to whoop you any time!
AkuBurgers1: You wait out front for Aku for a few minutes.
She doesn't seem to be showing up.
You call her on the phone.
You're gonna have to speak up a little, it's loud in here!
You better hurry up! I'm almost done eating!
You give up on waiting and go inside.
Aku is inside, sitting in the corner waving at you...
She is already halfway through her meal...
I figured you were cool and wouldn't mind if I went ahead and started without you.
You have burgers with Aku and discuss the ins and outs of friend etiquette.
AkuBurgers2: You get some burgers with Aku!
Aku is already waiting for you.
Aku is excitedly eating and talking with her mouth full.
Crumbs are spraying out of her mouth across the table.
I'm gonna quit my job and start streaming and playing fighting games full time.
But... for a pro gamer... I wonder if its better to be entertaining or skilled at the game.
Better to get that consistent streaming money than try to win big at tournaments.
On one hand... I think maybe focusing on skill is not the way to make a sustainable job...
but on the other hand HELL YEAH, now you're thinking with your butt and I love it!
You have burgers with Aku and discuss careers.
That was a really good date, thank you!
AkuBurgers3: You went to get some burgers PART THREE!
Aku is already waiting for you.
I'm about to smash... so many burgers, honestly.
That was a really good date, thank you!
AkuPark1: You go to the park with Aku.
Ah, its so nice out here!
Not too hot, not too cold.
Speaking of which, do like it better if its too hot or too cold outside?
You're a tough one, that's for sure.
If I start sweating, its freakin over for me, ugh.
If its cold, I'll just put more layers on.
But you can only take so many layers off if its too hot before...
You walk with Aku and talk about the weather.

Ok, I gotta ask you the hard question.
A real personal, deep, intrusive question.
